First, I would like to thank the developers of this software for
creating a very friendly and useful product.  So far, I have used this
as a scraper -- to go to a site/domain and grab everything.

I am looking for a tool that will allow me to focus on a domain and
only grab a few pages based on content - for example, simple text
searching criteria.  For instance, I may be only looking for pages
that contain the word "acre" or "juniper," or only pages that have
links to more than two .mpeg movies. Of course, the more useful things
are more complex.

In going through the documentation, I am am not clear whether or not
there is a filter or module to do this, and if not, whether it is
reasonable to think I could write one.

I am not sure if this fits into the philosophy of this tool.

Any pointers would be appreciated!

Thanks,

billo
